item.title: Deeds vs Dreams and Programming Language
item.description:
When we are Young life is filled with possibilities. Possibilities is the mission till we fly away from our parent's nest. Then Our life is getting more and more complex. Too Complex we confuse this with lots of things. Welcome to the Real Life (Tm)

This is same in Programming as well. Some languages promise us lots of possibilities but Burns in real world Some languages promise us Real Life(Tm). It is depressing as hell. So In order to have fun and some profit we need to strike the right balance.

I Think Clojure Strikes The balance

Just a Thought.
